metadata.name: Voivod: The True Story of Vlad the Impaler
metadata.description: Voivod Vlad Tepes has never been told as it really is: the entertainment industry, movies and comics have always depicted the monstrous character of the Prince of Wallachia in an unreal fashion; Tepes wasn't unreal for sure... Not at all... This is the story about this wicked figure and the characters who suffered the consequences of his deeds.
